processingCommand.script:
:SET &RPTAB_UPDATE# = "false"

:DEFINE &ADIR#, string, 5
:FILL &ADIR#[] = STR_SPLIT(&DIRECTION#, "_")
:SET &SOURCE_DATACENTER# = &ADIR#[1]
:SET &TARGET_DATACENTER# = &ADIR#[2]

:PUBLISH &SOURCE_DATACENTER#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &TARGET_DATACENTER#,,WORKFLOW

:IF &APP_SWITCH# = "Y"
:  IF &TARGET_DATACENTER# = &S_DATACENTER#
:    SET &WMS_RPTAB# = "N"
:    SET &EMS_RPTAB# = "N"
:    SET &RW_RPTAB# = "N"
:    SET &REFS_RPTAB# = "N"
:    SET &WMS_FAIL_RPTAB# = &WMS_PRIMARY_SHOULD_RUN#
:    SET &EMS_FAIL_RPTAB# = &EMS_PRIMARY_SHOULD_RUN#
:    SET &RW_FAIL_RPTAB# = &RW_PRIMARY_SHOULD_RUN#
:    SET &REFS_FAIL_RPTAB# = &REFS_PRIMARY_SHOULD_RUN#
:  ENDIF

:  IF &TARGET_DATACENTER# = &P_DATACENTER#
:    SET &WMS_RPTAB# = &WMS_FAILOVER_SHOULD_RUN#
:    SET &EMS_RPTAB# = &EMS_FAILOVER_SHOULD_RUN#
:    SET &RW_RPTAB# = &RW_FAILOVER_SHOULD_RUN#
:    SET &REFS_RPTAB# = &REFS_FAILOVER_SHOULD_RUN#
:    SET &WMS_FAIL_RPTAB# = "N"
:    SET &EMS_FAIL_RPTAB# = "N"
:    SET &RW_FAIL_RPTAB# = "N"
:    SET &REFS_FAIL_RPTAB# = "N"
:  ENDIF
:ENDIF

:IF &APP_SWITCH# = "N"
:  SET &WMS_RPTAB# = &WMS_PRIMARY_SHOULD_RUN#
:  SET &EMS_RPTAB# = &EMS_PRIMARY_SHOULD_RUN#
:  SET &RW_RPTAB# = &RW_PRIMARY_SHOULD_RUN#
:  SET &REFS_RPTAB# = &REFS_PRIMARY_SHOULD_RUN#
:  SET &WMS_FAIL_RPTAB# = &WMS_FAILOVER_SHOULD_RUN#
:  SET &EMS_FAIL_RPTAB# = &EMS_FAILOVER_SHOULD_RUN#
:  SET &RW_FAIL_RPTAB# = &RW_FAILOVER_SHOULD_RUN#
:  SET &REFS_FAIL_RPTAB# = &REFS_FAILOVER_SHOULD_RUN#
:ENDIF

:IF &APP_SWITCH# = "Y"
:  IF &DR_TESTING# = "Y"
:    SET &RPTAB_UPDATE# = "true"
:  ENDIF
:ENDIF

:PUBLISH &RPTAB_UPDATE#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &WMS_RPTAB#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &EMS_RPTAB#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &RW_RPTAB#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &REFS_RPTAB#,,WORKFLOW

:PUBLISH &WMS_FAIL_RPTAB#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &EMS_FAIL_RPTAB#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &RW_FAIL_RPTAB#,,WORKFLOW
:PUBLISH &REFS_FAIL_RPTAB#,,WORKFLOW
